resources:
s Simpill Welcome Thank you for choosing Simpill!

To create your first pill, select the plus button at the bottom of your screen. Next Previous Settings About addPillButton Pill Time Pill Bottle Icon tick undo Pill Name Melatonin Take daily at 10:00pm Reminder Date Pill Name? Time? Refill Date? clock calendar Create Pill Cancel Simpill is a medication reminder app.

It doesn't contain any trackers, ads or unnecessary permissions.

It is open-source which means anyone can audit the Simpill code.

Source code: https://gitlab.com/Winston69/simpill

Have you found any bugs or would you like to suggest some ideas for Simpill? Feel free to contact me :)

My email: simpilldev@gmail.com

If Simpill has helped you and you want to support its development, you can donate cryptocurrency.

All donations are greatly appreciated! :) Free & Open Source addr1q98k39a0hft8zpxnyugzl9t83kuqqh3d7x4rr02ltumx5f4wjnysxzth6py5g7l2xyw9y3t000mqzv4pyzrlm5spgt2stp8wkh 0x47be4fe89a2d658ce03434cb70021d3448dd2a20 86ywTu1eDABJB2CxGf9mwMbX6ibfc7pga1XusQCrfvMYdNpNPto1BaDSbWeas13Nkg3iLigkzS7wSGc8YoQxEkHhHdrA4Ni bc1q8r90zc8j8a2rvkq4ds8374pxh3rpccxgnjx5x2 pn1qdfzqkjg3gh6az5al6pf93w8a9phj7xmz28jrme Supply? 30 Take at Taken at https://www.getmonero.org https://bitcoin.org https://pandacoin.tech Pill Bottle Pill About Simpill Button Not applicable Update Pill Pill Bottle Color? You are already in the About section! pill name It's time to take your medication: I Have a TARDIS The reminder date you have set is in the past. Unless you have a TARDIS, I would not recommend this. Incorrect date set? Pill Name Dialog null Pill added :) pill time pill date pill amount is pill taken time taken bottle color Delete Pill Are you sure you want to delete this pill?

This cannot be undone! Delete Back Ok Create Pill Enter Pill Amount Enter Pill Amount Enter Pill Name Stockup Reminder Don't forget to stockup on your soon :) Unless you have access to a TARDIS, the date cannot be set in the past. Please set a date for your refill reminder. error Reset Pill taken Pill updated :) Your pill supply amount must be greater than 0. Pill name must begin with a letter. Error!
